recipe.title: Strawberry Coulis
instructions: 1. In a medium saucepan, combine the strawberries, sugar, and lemon juice. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Transfer to a blender. 2. Purée until smooth, strain, and set aside. Store in a sealed container in the refrigerator for up to 1 week.

2. Purée until smooth, strain, and set aside. Store in a sealed container in the refrigerator for up to 1 week.
